details.question:
Here's a perfect match resume for the job description:

John Doe
Backend Software Engineer
(123) 456-7890
johndoe@example.com
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/johndoe

Summary:
Highly skilled backend software engineer with 5+ years of experience in designing and implementing efficient, scalable solutions. Proficient in TypeScript and Golang, with a strong focus on performance optimization, high system availability, and clean code. Proven track record of successfully integrating APIs with frontend, database, and other modules.

Technical Skills:
- Programming languages: TypeScript, Golang, JavaScript
- Development frameworks: Express.js, Revel
- Database management: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
- API design: RESTful APIs, GraphQL
- Operating Systems: Linux, Windows
- Agile methodologies: Scrum, Kanban
- Version control: Git, SVN

Professional Experience:
Backend Software Engineer, ABC Company (2018-Present)
- Designed and implemented multiple scalable backend solutions using TypeScript and Golang
- Developed server-side logic, integrated APIs with frontend and database, and ensured high system availability
- Optimized performance by 30% through code refactoring and caching implementation
- Collaborated with international teams, reporting directly to the BE Lead
- Implemented automated testing and deployment scripts using Jenkins and Docker

Senior Backend Developer, DEF Startup (2015-2018)
- Led the development of a real-time analytics platform using Golang and MongoDB
- Integrated APIs with multiple data sources, ensuring high data consistency and availability
- Implemented load balancing and auto-scaling using Kubernetes and AWS
- Mentored junior developers, providing code reviews and technical guidance

Education:
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, XYZ University (2010-2014)

Soft Skills:
- Strong communication and teamwork skills, with experience working in international teams
- Excellent problem-solving skills, with a focus on performance optimization and debugging
- Adaptable and able to learn new technologies quickly, with a strong desire for continuous improvement
- Strong attention to detail, with a focus on writing clean, reusable, and testable code

Certifications:
- Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
- Certified Git Developer

References:
Available upon request.
contexts:
Design and implement efficient, scalable backend solutions. 
Develop server-side logic using TypeScript and Golang. 
Integrate APIs with the frontend, database, and other modules. 
Optimize performance and ensure high system availability. 
Write clean, reusable, and testable code. 
Report directly to the international BE Lead.

üîπ Job Summary
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Backend Engineer (Python/Django) to join our engineering team. You will play a key role in designing, building, and optimizing backend systems that are scalable, secure, maintainable, and aligned with long-term product strategy.  You will also mentor junior engineers, participate in architectural discussions, and contribute to solving complex technical challenges across the platform.
üîπ Key Responsibilities
Team Collaboration & Delivery
Participate in daily Scrum meetings; report progress, planned tasks, and blockers.  
Work closely with Design, Frontend, and QC teams to deliver features that meet both business and technical requirements.  
Ensure high code quality by following Clean Code, linting standards, Conventional Commit rules, and ensuring all QC test cases are passed.
System Design & Development
Design, build, and optimize backend architecture for scalability, performance, security, maintainability, and reliability.  
Develop and maintain RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and inter-service communication layers.  
Participate in system improvement initiatives and contribute ideas for architectural enhancement.  
Leadership & Mentorship
Review code, provide feedback, and mentor junior/mid-level engineers.  
Share best practices, guidelines, and technical knowledge with the team.

What do we do? 
As a pioneer for digital transformation, GFT develops sustainable solutions across new technologies ‚Äì from cloud engineering and artificial intelligence to blockchain/DLT. With its deep technological expertise, strong partnerships, and comprehensive market know-how, GFT offers advice to the financial and insurance sectors, as well as the manufacturing industry. Through the intelligent use of IT solutions, GFT increases productivity and creates added value for clients. Companies gain easy and safe access to scalable IT applications and innovative business models. 
  Who are we? 
Having started in Germany in 1987, GFT Technologies has grown to become a trusted Software Engineering and Consulting specialist for the international financial industry, counting many of the world‚Äôs largest and best-known banks as our clients. We are an organization that empowers you to not only explore but also raise your potential and seek out opportunities that add value. At GFT, diversity, equality, and inclusion are at the core of who we are. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive working environment for all communities is one of the main pillars of our diversity strategy, based on our core values and culture. We have been certified for 2022/23 as a ‚ÄòGreat Place to Work‚Äô in the APAC region. So, if you want to have the opportunity to work with an outstanding and progressive organization, this position could be right for you. 
 Role Summary 
We are looking for experienced and talented (Senior) Backend Engineers to join our global engineering teams and developing and operating our flagship product (Digital Bank platform). 
 Sign-on Bonus: Eligible for candidates who are currently employed elsewhere and able to join GFT before 4th January 2026.
 Key Responsibilities 
Design, develop, implement and maintain Java application
Write high quality, maintainable code using TDD and DDD
Translating user stories into working solution
Design and implement RESTful APIs
Design and implement microservice architecture within the give domain
Work with the distributed team in multiple time zones
Actively participate in Scrum technologies

details.question:
John Doe
123 Main Street, Anytown, USA 12345
(123) 456-7890 | johndoe@email.com

Objective:
To obtain a challenging position as a Web/Mobile Software Developer, utilizing my skills in React.js, TypeScript, and blockchain integration to develop high-quality software for international markets.

Summary:
Highly motivated and experienced Web/Mobile Software Developer with 5+ years of experience in developing scalable and efficient web interfaces using React.js and TypeScript. Proficient in optimizing web performance, integrating blockchain APIs, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products.

Technical Skills:
- Programming languages: JavaScript, TypeScript
- Frontend frameworks: React.js
- Blockchain integration: Web3.js, Ethers.js
- UI/UX design implementation
- Web performance optimization
- API integration and management
- Agile development methodologies
- Version control systems: Git

Professional Experience:
Web/Mobile Software Developer, ABC Company (2018-Present)
- Develop web interfaces using React.js and TypeScript, ensuring accurate implementation of UI/UX designs
- Optimize web performance to ensure a smooth user experience, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement
- Integrate blockchain APIs (Web3.js, Ethers.js) to display on-chain data, enabling real-time data visualization
- Collaborate with backend team to connect with APIs and ensure task completion, resulting in a 25% reduction in project timelines
- Take responsibility for assigned tasks, providing accurate estimates and delivering high-quality results

Education:
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, XYZ University (2015-2019)

Soft Skills:
- Strong communication and teamwork skills
- Ability to work independently and take responsibility for assigned tasks
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
- Adaptable and able to learn new technologies quickly
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality results
- Experience working in an Agile development environment, with a strong understanding of iterative development and continuous improvement

Certifications:
- Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
- Certified Blockchain Developer (CBD)

References:
Available upon request.
contexts:
Develop Web/Mobile software for international markets.
Take responsibility for assigned tasks and provide accurate estimates.
Develop web interfaces using React.js + TypeScript based on UI/UX designs.
Optimize web performance to ensure a smooth user experience.
Integrate blockchain APIs (Web3.js, Ethers.js) to display on-chain data.
Collaborate with backend team to connect with APIs and ensure task completion.

1. Front-End Development
‚Ä¢ Design and implement a modern, responsive web application front end using React.js.
‚Ä¢ Ensure seamless user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design, optimized for performance, accessibility, and scalability across browsers and devices.
 2. Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) Layer
‚Ä¢ Develop a BFF service layer to serve as the intermediary between the front end and backend systems.
‚Ä¢ Provide optimized APIs, data aggregation, and transformation to ensure efficient communication, performance tuning, and maintainable client-server interaction.
 3. Additional Backend Components
‚Ä¢ Design and implement supporting backend components, including but not limited to:
- Database architecture and schema design for structured and unstructured data.
- System integration with third-party APIs, services, and enterprise systems.
- Security monitoring, and scalability considerations to ensure enterprise-grade robustness.
 4. Backend Algorithm and AI Development (Better to have)
‚Ä¢ Design and implement core backend services, with a strong emphasis on AI-driven capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Key areas include:
- Generative AI (GenAI) integration, including standard Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) frameworks.
- Graph-based RAG approaches to enhance context linking and retrieval accuracy.
- AI Agent development for orchestration, task automation, and reasoning workflows.
- Data intake pipelines to support structured and unstructured data ingestion.
- Information retrieval systems optimized for speed, scalability, and relevance.

We are looking for a Senior Fullstack Developer (Node.js / React) with the potential to step into a Tech Lead role
 Responsibilities
Day-to-Day Functional Duties
Collaborate closely with internal and external project members to provide technical insights and deliver solutions aligned with business goals.
Deeply understand system architecture, refine technical standards, and promote coding best practices.
Proactively detect and resolve system issues, mitigate technical risks, and drive continuous improvements.
Design and build scalable backend services that ensure top performance, stability, and reliability.
Develop and maintain complex, high-performing web services and interfaces to enhance customer experience.
Mentor teammates through code reviews, knowledge sharing, and best practice guidance.
Continuously improve system usability and performance while staying updated on new technologies and trends.
Reporting & Monitoring
Maintain clear, detailed technical documentation for all software, systems, and processes.
Work closely with the PDM for consistent reporting, planning, and project tracking.
Prepare and present project reports to keep stakeholders informed of progress and performance.
Cooperation & Collaboration
Communicate and collaborate effectively across teams, departments, and stakeholders.
Champion company standards and technical excellence across all projects.
Coordinate seamlessly with third-party development partners to ensure smooth daily operations.

details.question:
Here is a perfect match resume for the Senior Data Engineer position:

John Doe
Senior Data Engineer
(123) 456-7890 | johndoe@email.com | linkedin.com/in/johndoe

Summary:
Highly experienced Senior Data Engineer with 8+ years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining large-scale data platforms. Proven track record of driving platform modernization, building scalable data pipelines, and leading data engineering teams. Skilled in Apache Airflow, Python, Spark, Delta Lake, Snowflake, and Power BI.

Technical Skills:
- Programming languages: Python, Scala, Java
- Data processing frameworks: Apache Spark, Apache Beam
- Data ingestion and orchestration: Apache Airflow, Apache NiFi
- Data storage: Delta Lake, Snowflake, Apache HBase
- Data analytics: Power BI, Tableau
- Operating Systems: Linux, Windows
- Cloud platforms: AWS, GCP, Azure
- Agile methodologies: Scrum, Kanban

Professional Experience:
Senior Data Engineer, ABC Corporation (2018-Present)
- Led the design and development of a modern data architecture, resulting in a 300% increase in data processing efficiency
- Built and maintained scalable data pipelines using Apache Airflow and Python, handling 100+ million records daily
- Implemented comprehensive monitoring and alerting using Prometheus and Grafana, reducing data pipeline downtime by 90%
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and optimize data models in Snowflake for analytical workloads
- Mentored junior data engineers and contributed to building a strong data engineering culture

Senior Data Engineer, DEF Startups (2015-2018)
- Developed and maintained large-scale data pipelines using Apache Spark and Scala, handling 500+ million records daily
- Designed and implemented a data ingestion framework using Apache NiFi and Apache Kafka, resulting in a 50% reduction in data latency
- Worked with data scientists to develop and deploy machine learning models using scikit-learn and TensorFlow
- Participated in code reviews and ensured adherence to engineering best practices, resulting in a 25% reduction in code defects

Education:
- Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, XYZ University (2010-2014)

Certifications:
- Certified Data Engineer, Google Cloud (2019)
- Certified Spark Developer, Databricks (2017)

Soft Skills:
- Strong leadership and mentoring skills, with experience leading data engineering teams
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with experience working with cross-functional teams
- Strong problem-solving skills, with experience debugging complex data pipelines
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, with experience meeting tight deadlines
- Strong attention to detail, with experience ensuring data quality and reliability

Achievements:
- Winner of the 2020 Data Engineering Hackathon, with a project focused on building a real-time data pipeline using Apache Kafka and Apache Spark
- Published a research paper on "Optimizing Data Pipelines using Apache Airflow and Python" in the 2019 International Conference on Data Engineering

References:
Available upon request.
contexts:
Design and customize reports.
Modify databases according to requests and perform tests.
Monitoring the data quality of data pipelines, provide data management support to clients.
Liaise with developers to improve applications and establish best practices.
Responsible for building and maintaining optimized and highly available data pipelines that facilitate deeper analysis and reporting.
Developing and implementing data models, data marts for enterprise data lake/data warehouse and integration development process.
Building new Data Analytics solutions to provide insights for decision-making and performance improvements.
Writing effective and scalable ETL processes in building the business‚Äô data collection systems and processing pipelines.
Participate in Agile/Scrum activities: daily standup, demo session, retrospective, estimate and planning, etc.
Provide mentoring/training for junior members if any.
Perform other tasks assigned by the Leader/ Manager.

Key Responsibilities
AI ENGINEER
Work closely as a project team as the main contributor in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Developing scalable AI systems and designing/building algorithms that automate predictive data models.
Creating and managing the AI development and production infrastructure, including automating AI infrastructures for data science teams.
Participating in all phases of AI solutions development, from requirements definition and design to development, deployment, integration, maintenance, performance tuning, and monitoring.
Collaborating extensively with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to define project requirements, ensure seamless progress, and facilitate AI adoption and best practices.
Driving scalability improvements and introducing new capabilities in machine learning platforms, often working across the full stack on tools and infrastructure that empower machine learning teams.
DATA SCIENTIST
Work closely as a project team to lead in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Owns planning of assigned modules, contributes to task breakdown, estimation, and milestone alignment, and supports backlog grooming discussions.
Leads development of a complete module or sub-system (e.g., full model training pipeline or certain solution direction). Can propose solution design, test, and iterate independently. Coordinates with project lead to align with project needs.
Proactively explores and evaluates new tools or methods relevant to the problem domain and integrates them into module-level components with minimal supervision.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Proactive in contributing to the growth of internal capabilities (e.g., training, knowledge-sharing, framework design).

About Galaxy Joy 
Galaxy Joy operates Vietnam's leading loyalty platform, powering the Vietjet SkyJoy program andconnecting over 250 brand partners across thecountry. As we expand across ASEAN,we're building a world-class data infrastructure from the ground up to support real-time transaction processing, partner integrations, and data-driven decision making at scale
Job Description: 
We're looking for a Senior Data Engineer to join our growing data team and play a central role in transforming our data infrastructure into a modern, scalable platform. This is a hands-on leadership position where you'll own critical deliverables, drive architectural decisions, and help establish best practices as we build out our medallion architecture. You'll work across the full data stack, from ingestion and orchestration through transformation andanalytics, and have significant influence over how we design and operate our data platform.
1.Platform Modernization
You will drive the transformation of legacy systems into our modern data architecture. This includes championing engineering best practices such as code reviews, documentation, and testing, as well as mentoring junior team members andcontributing to building our data engineering culture.
2. Data Ingestion and Orchestration
You will design, develop, and maintain robust data pipelines using Apache Airflow and Python. This includes building and optimizing DAGs for ingesting data from brand partners with varying formats anddelivery methods. You'll ensure data quality and reliability at the point of ingestion with proper validation and error handling.
3. Data Transformation and Processing
You will own heavy data transformation workloads, translating complex business requirements into efficient Spark jobs. This involves building and maintaining scalable data pipelines that handle late arriving data, schema evolution, and partner data synchronization. You'll implement comprehensive monitoring and alerting to ensure pipeline health and data freshness, working with Delta Lake for reliable, ACID-compliant data processing.
4. Analytics and Reporting
You will design and optimize data models in Snowflake for analytical workloads. You'll partner with BI teams to ensure data is structured for effective Power BI reporting and self-service analytics, and build aggregation pipelines that support business intelligence and operational reporting needs.
details.ground_truth:
About Galaxy Joy 
Galaxy Joy operates Vietnam's leading loyalty platform, powering the Vietjet SkyJoy program andconnecting over 250 brand partners across thecountry. As we expand across ASEAN,we're building a world-class data infrastructure from the ground up to support real-time transaction processing, partner integrations, and data-driven decision making at scale
Job Description: 
We're looking for a Senior Data Engineer to join our growing data team and play a central role in transforming our data infrastructure into a modern, scalable platform. This is a hands-on leadership position where you'll own critical deliverables, drive architectural decisions, and help establish best practices as we build out our medallion architecture. You'll work across the full data stack, from ingestion and orchestration through transformation andanalytics, and have significant influence over how we design and operate our data platform.
1.Platform Modernization
You will drive the transformation of legacy systems into our modern data architecture. This includes championing engineering best practices such as code reviews, documentation, and testing, as well as mentoring junior team members andcontributing to building our data engineering culture.
2. Data Ingestion and Orchestration
You will design, develop, and maintain robust data pipelines using Apache Airflow and Python. This includes building and optimizing DAGs for ingesting data from brand partners with varying formats anddelivery methods. You'll ensure data quality and reliability at the point of ingestion with proper validation and error handling.
3. Data Transformation and Processing
You will own heavy data transformation workloads, translating complex business requirements into efficient Spark jobs. This involves building and maintaining scalable data pipelines that handle late arriving data, schema evolution, and partner data synchronization. You'll implement comprehensive monitoring and alerting to ensure pipeline health and data freshness, working with Delta Lake for reliable, ACID-compliant data processing.
4. Analytics and Reporting
You will design and optimize data models in Snowflake for analytical workloads. You'll partner with BI teams to ensure data is structured for effective Power BI reporting and self-service analytics, and build aggregation pipelines that support business intelligence and operational reporting needs.

We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer to help shape the next generation of ERA‚Äôs digital experiences. You will work with a talented engineering team to build fast, intuitive, and mobile-responsive web applications used by ERA users. Collaborate closely with backend, mobile, and QA engineers to deliver seamless features end-to-end.
Work with product managers and designers to translate business needs into clear technical solutions.  
Stay updated on emerging frontend technologies and best practices and bring new ideas to enhance our development workflow.

You will work closely with other engineers, product managers, designers, and QA specialists to deliver innovative and impactful mobile solutions. You will be a hands-on contributor, writing code, reviewing code, and mentoring other engineers.

üîπ Job Summary
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Backend Engineer (Python/Django) to join our engineering team. You will play a key role in designing, building, and optimizing backend systems that are scalable, secure, maintainable, and aligned with long-term product strategy.  You will also mentor junior engineers, participate in architectural discussions, and contribute to solving complex technical challenges across the platform.
üîπ Key Responsibilities
Team Collaboration & Delivery
Participate in daily Scrum meetings; report progress, planned tasks, and blockers.  
Work closely with Design, Frontend, and QC teams to deliver features that meet both business and technical requirements.  
Ensure high code quality by following Clean Code, linting standards, Conventional Commit rules, and ensuring all QC test cases are passed.
System Design & Development
Design, build, and optimize backend architecture for scalability, performance, security, maintainability, and reliability.  
Develop and maintain RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and inter-service communication layers.  
Participate in system improvement initiatives and contribute ideas for architectural enhancement.  
Leadership & Mentorship
Review code, provide feedback, and mentor junior/mid-level engineers.  
Share best practices, guidelines, and technical knowledge with the team.

What do we do? 
As a pioneer for digital transformation, GFT develops sustainable solutions across new technologies ‚Äì from cloud engineering and artificial intelligence to blockchain/DLT. With its deep technological expertise, strong partnerships, and comprehensive market know-how, GFT offers advice to the financial and insurance sectors, as well as the manufacturing industry. Through the intelligent use of IT solutions, GFT increases productivity and creates added value for clients. Companies gain easy and safe access to scalable IT applications and innovative business models. 
  Who are we? 
Having started in Germany in 1987, GFT Technologies has grown to become a trusted Software Engineering and Consulting specialist for the international financial industry, counting many of the world‚Äôs largest and best-known banks as our clients. We are an organization that empowers you to not only explore but also raise your potential and seek out opportunities that add value. At GFT, diversity, equality, and inclusion are at the core of who we are. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive working environment for all communities is one of the main pillars of our diversity strategy, based on our core values and culture. We have been certified for 2022/23 as a ‚ÄòGreat Place to Work‚Äô in the APAC region. So, if you want to have the opportunity to work with an outstanding and progressive organization, this position could be right for you. 
 Role Summary

As a pioneer for digital transformation, GFT develops sustainable solutions across new technologies ‚Äì from cloud engineering and artificial intelligence to blockchain/DLT. With its deep technological expertise, strong partnerships, and comprehensive market know-how, GFT offers advice to the financial and insurance sectors, as well as the manufacturing industry.   Who are we? 
Having started in Germany in 1987, GFT Technologies has grown to become a trusted Software Engineering and Consulting specialist for the international financial industry, counting many of the world‚Äôs largest and best-known banks as our clients. We are an organization that empowers you to not only explore but also raise your potential and seek out opportunities that add value. At GFT, diversity, equality, and inclusion are at the core of who we are. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive working environment for all communities is one of the main pillars of our diversity strategy, based on our core values and culture. Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Owns planning of assigned modules, contributes to task breakdown, estimation, and milestone alignment, and supports backlog grooming discussions.
Leads development of a complete module or sub-system (e.g., full model training pipeline or certain solution direction). Can propose solution design, test, and iterate independently. Coordinates with project lead to align with project needs.
Proactively explores and evaluates new tools or methods relevant to the problem domain and integrates them into module-level components with minimal supervision.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Proactive in contributing to the growth of internal capabilities (e.g., training, knowledge-sharing, framework design).

1. Dashboard Development & Management
Build and maintain automated, interactive dashboards in Looker Studio.
Develop performance tracking for:
Product & User Behavior: DAU/MAU, retention, churn, conversion, user journey.
Content & Sports Data: engagement by league/match/player/content type.
Business & Marketing: CAC, LTV, ARPU, campaign effectiveness.
Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and processing performance.
Conduct regular data reconciliation across sources.
2. Deep-Dive Analysis
Perform insight-driven analysis with actionable recommendations.
Partner with Product Team on metric definitions and A/B testing.
Conduct funnel analysis to identify drop-offs and propose UI/UX optimizations.
Handle ad-hoc reports for cross-functional teams.
3. Data Processing & Modeling
Write and optimize complex SQL queries (CTEs, Window Functions, complex JOINs).
Collaborate with Backend to design analytical data models.
Perform data cleaning, validation, and transformation for reporting.

üîπ Job Summary
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Backend Engineer (Python/Django) to join our engineering team. You will play a key role in designing, building, and optimizing backend systems that are scalable, secure, maintainable, and aligned with long-term product strategy.  You will also mentor junior engineers, participate in architectural discussions, and contribute to solving complex technical challenges across the platform.
üîπ Key Responsibilities
Team Collaboration & Delivery
Participate in daily Scrum meetings; report progress, planned tasks, and blockers.  
Work closely with Design, Frontend, and QC teams to deliver features that meet both business and technical requirements.  
Ensure high code quality by following Clean Code, linting standards, Conventional Commit rules, and ensuring all QC test cases are passed.
System Design & Development
Design, build, and optimize backend architecture for scalability, performance, security, maintainability, and reliability.  
Develop and maintain RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and inter-service communication layers.  
Participate in system improvement initiatives and contribute ideas for architectural enhancement.  
Leadership & Mentorship
Review code, provide feedback, and mentor junior/mid-level engineers.  
Share best practices, guidelines, and technical knowledge with the team.

Our Tech stack:
Our core services consist hundreds of Golang microservices built around domain oriented, event driven architecture. All run on GCP, GKE, Istio with autoscaling, resiliency and chaos engineering mindset with full end to end observability.
Our mobile platform was running on Android/iOS/Flutter, component based, composable architecture. Web app largely on TypeScript, React, NextJS, Tailwind CSS and composable in-house design components and framework. 
Gitlab for all code repository, CI/CD, with Backstage as centralized developer productivity platform.
DevOps culture, you are fully responsible with design, build, and operate your own services with support from SRE, Platform team as needed
Open source lover, and open source contributor. All tooling and platforms used was in-house custom built on popular open source projects
Embraced engineering culture, and agile development.
Spirit
Accept failures, learn from it and move extremely fast. 
Flexible working environment, and performance-based optimization focus
Ownership and excellent learning opportunity, in-house and external
Be part of the team, who set the trend, influence and build meaningful product to millions of fello Vietnamese
Responsibilities:
You will work closely with the Product, UX/UI and Backend teams to design, build new products, platforms and features.
More senior engineers will act as a role model and mentor to more junior members.
Build re-usable Android software components for the Be platform.
Collaborate with QA on continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) as well as other automated and manual testing to make sure our app release cycles
You will monitor the performance of the live apps and continuously improve them on both code and experience level.
Design, build and improve the mobile experiences for one of the world's fastest growing mobile app in ride-hailing, payments and logistics.
Provide technology leadership to the team and foster engineering excellence.
Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross functional teams in a global environment.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
Help maintain code quality, organization and automatization

John Doe
Data Analyst
(123) 456-7890 | johndoe@email.com | LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/johndoe

Summary:
Results-driven Data Analyst with 5+ years of experience in building and managing interactive dashboards, performing deep-dive analysis, and processing complex data models. Proficient in Looker Studio, SQL, and data visualization. Proven track record of driving business growth through data-driven insights and recommendations.

Technical Skills:
- Looker Studio (dashboard development and management)
- SQL (writing and optimizing complex queries, CTEs, Window Functions, JOINs)
- Data visualization and reporting
- Data modeling and design
- Data cleaning, validation, and transformation
- Data reconciliation and processing performance optimization
- A/B testing and experimentation
- Funnel analysis and UI/UX optimization

Professional Experience:
Senior Data Analyst, ABC Company (2020-Present)
- Built and maintained automated, interactive dashboards in Looker Studio to track key performance metrics (DAU/MAU, retention, churn, conversion, user journey)
- Developed and implemented performance tracking for product and user behavior, content and sports data, and business and marketing metrics (CAC, LTV, ARPU, campaign effectiveness)
- Conducted regular data reconciliation across sources to ensure data accuracy and consistency
- Partnered with Product Team to define metrics and conduct A/B testing, resulting in 25% increase in user engagement
- Performed funnel analysis to identify drop-offs and proposed UI/UX optimizations, resulting in 15% increase in conversion rates
- Collaborated with Backend to design analytical data models and wrote complex SQL queries to support reporting needs

Data Analyst, DEF Company (2018-2020)
- Developed and maintained reports to track key business metrics (revenue, customer acquisition, customer retention)
- Conducted ad-hoc analysis and provided insights to cross-functional teams, resulting in 10% increase in sales
- Worked with Product Team to design and implement A/B testing and experimentation framework
- Cleaned, validated, and transformed large datasets to support reporting needs

Education:
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, XYZ University (2018)

Certifications:
- Google Data Analytics Certification
- Looker Studio Certification

Soft Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines
- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills
- Proven ability to drive business growth through data-driven insights and recommendations

Perform insight-driven analysis with actionable recommendations.

Design and customize reports.

Responsible for building and maintaining optimized and highly available data pipelines that facilitate deeper analysis and reporting.
Developing and implementing data models, data marts for enterprise data lake/data warehouse and integration development process.
Building new Data Analytics solutions to provide insights for decision-making and performance improvements.
Writing effective and scalable ETL processes in building the business‚Äô data collection systems and processing pipelines.
Participate in Agile/Scrum activities: daily standup, demo session, retrospective, estimate and planning, etc.
Provide mentoring/training for junior members if any.
Perform other tasks assigned by the Leader/ Manager.

Key Responsibilities
AI ENGINEER
Work closely as a project team as the main contributor in the entire lifecycle of data science projects, from gathering business requirements to solution delivery, and deliver project outcomes to internal stakeholders or external customers.
Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Developing scalable AI systems and designing/building algorithms that automate predictive data models.
Creating and managing the AI development and production infrastructure, including automating AI infrastructures for data science teams.
Participating in all phases of AI solutions development, from requirements definition and design to development, deployment, integration, maintenance, performance tuning, and monitoring.
Collaborating extensively with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to define project requirements, ensure seamless progress, and facilitate AI adoption and best practices.

Engages with clients to understand business needs, present findings, and align technical work with stakeholder goals.
Owns planning of assigned modules, contributes to task breakdown, estimation, and milestone alignment, and supports backlog grooming discussions.

Proactively explores and evaluates new tools or methods relevant to the problem domain and integrates them into module-level components with minimal supervision.
Provides structured feedback to junior members, supports onboarding, and contributes to skill-building within the project team.
Proactive in contributing to the growth of internal capabilities (e.g., training, knowledge-sharing, framework design).

Education:
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, National University of Singapore (2015)

Certifications:

- Certified Java Developer (OCPJP)

Soft Skills:
- Strong communication and teamwork skills, with experience working in collaborative and dynamic environments
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to break down complex issues and develop creative solutions
- Strong leadership and mentoring skills, with experience leading and guiding cross-functional teams

contexts:
We are looking for a Senior Fullstack Developer (Node.js / React) with the potential to step into a Tech Lead role
 Responsibilities
Day-to-Day Functional Duties
Collaborate closely with internal and external project members to provide technical insights and deliver solutions aligned with business goals.
Deeply understand system architecture, refine technical standards, and promote coding best practices.
Proactively detect and resolve system issues, mitigate technical risks, and drive continuous improvements.
Design and build scalable backend services that ensure top performance, stability, and reliability.
Develop and maintain complex, high-performing web services and interfaces to enhance customer experience.
Mentor teammates through code reviews, knowledge sharing, and best practice guidance.
Continuously improve system usability and performance while staying updated on new technologies and trends.
Reporting & Monitoring
Maintain clear, detailed technical documentation for all software, systems, and processes.
Work closely with the PDM for consistent reporting, planning, and project tracking.
Prepare and present project reports to keep stakeholders informed of progress and performance.
Cooperation & Collaboration
Communicate and collaborate effectively across teams, departments, and stakeholders.
Champion company standards and technical excellence across all projects.
Coordinate seamlessly with third-party development partners to ensure smooth daily operations.

Our Tech stack:
Our core services consist hundreds of Golang microservices built around domain oriented, event driven architecture. All run on GCP, GKE, Istio with autoscaling, resiliency and chaos engineering mindset with full end to end observability.
Our mobile platform was running on Android/iOS/Flutter, component based, composable architecture. Web app largely on TypeScript, React, NextJS, Tailwind CSS and composable in-house design components and framework. 
Gitlab for all code repository, CI/CD, with Backstage as centralized developer productivity platform.
DevOps culture, you are fully responsible with design, build, and operate your own services with support from SRE, Platform team as needed
Open source lover, and open source contributor. All tooling and platforms used was in-house custom built on popular open source projects
Embraced engineering culture, and agile development.
Spirit
Accept failures, learn from it and move extremely fast. 
Flexible working environment, and performance-based optimization focus
Ownership and excellent learning opportunity, in-house and external
Be part of the team, who set the trend, influence and build meaningful product to millions of fello Vietnamese
Responsibilities:
You will work closely with the Product, UX/UI and Backend teams to design, build new products, platforms and features.
More senior engineers will act as a role model and mentor to more junior members.
Build re-usable Android software components for the Be platform.
Collaborate with QA on continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) as well as other automated and manual testing to make sure our app release cycles
You will monitor the performance of the live apps and continuously improve them on both code and experience level.
Design, build and improve the mobile experiences for one of the world's fastest growing mobile app in ride-hailing, payments and logistics.
Provide technology leadership to the team and foster engineering excellence.
Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross functional teams in a global environment.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
Help maintain code quality, organization and automatization

You will have the opportunity to focus on the aspects of the job that you enjoy the most. Specifically, you will:
Developing scalable new features for our software product that exceeds our customer‚Äôs needs.
Building architecture for our platform to ensure optimal performance.
Obtaining requirement feedback from internal teams/clients to maintain/support the product development.
Write the Unit Tests for robust development.
Performing code reviews on other team members‚Äô work.
Taking ownership of projects and having the opportunity to further your knowledge
Taking control over your productivity and improving your time management and communication skills

Established in 2009, Floating Cube Studios is a Singapore-based technology innovator specializing in cutting-edge Point-of-Sale (POS) and SaaS solutions. Backed by Ant International ‚Äî a global leader in digital payments and financial technology ‚Äî we play a pivotal role in developing innovative, scalable, and user-centric digital solutions that power EPOS products. contexts:
We are a global product team focused on building payment and e-commerce solutions that make an impact. We have dedicated our efforts to assisting merchants in running online businesses and reaching customers in every country in the world.
Who Are We Looking For
We‚Äôre looking for a proactive and results-driven Product Manager who thrives in fast-paced environments and is passionate about building impactful solutions. You should be strategic, customer-focused, and execution-oriented ‚Äî capable of translating business needs into product strategy, aligning cross-functional teams, and driving the end-to-end product lifecycle from discovery to launch. If you excel at identifying opportunities, shipping valuable features, and continuously improving products based on data and feedback, this role is for you.
HONESTY and TRUST are core to who we are. We expect transparent and truthful communication from all our team members.
LEARNING and CURIOSITY are essential for growth here. You bring fresh ideas, creativity, and a desire to develop daily, absorbing knowledge from those around you.
Multilingual and Multilingual? Even better. You embrace international collaboration and thrive in global environments. Bonus points if you have cross-border experience or fluency in multiple languages.
Position Overview
As the Product Manager, you will drive the development and enhancement of our AI-powered global identity platform. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver a product that not only meets rigorous compliance standards but also provides an exceptional user experience across our diverse client base spanning 190+ countries.
What You Will Do
Lead the strategic planning and execution platform development, ensuring alignment with our vision of becoming the gold standard in identity verification
Orchestrate the implementation of advanced AI/ML technologies that power our automated verification processes, including state-of-the-art OCR, Face ID, Voice ID, Anti-deepfake, etc
Manage the development of our multimodal verification capabilities spanning ID document processing, face liveness verification, and AML screening across 200+ languages
Coordinate with engineering teams to enhance our microservice architecture, ensuring scalability and flexibility as our user base grows
Drive the continuous improvement of our REST APIs and SDKs for major platforms, facilitating seamless integration for our clients
Collaborate with data scientists and AI specialists to refine our dynamic risk assessment models and ensure they remain at the cutting edge of fraud detection
Balance the implementation of automated verification with human expert oversight to maintain the highest levels of accuracy and integrity
Ensure all platform developments adhere to global compliance standards and prioritize data privacy and security

The MoMo Recommendation Platform is a complex system that powers personalized experiences for millions of users using a diverse range of technologies.
We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Software Engineer with strong system thinking, architecture design skills, and a product mindset to help build the MLOps platform that transforms any AI/ML solutions into production-grade systems at scale.
 Think like a product engineer: you don‚Äôt just ‚Äúcode a solution‚Äù ‚Äì you build a platform that empowers others to deliver intelligent sys
Design and develop a flexible platform that turns AI/ML solutions into production-ready systems: microservices, batch pipelines, or real-time APIs
Build infrastructure to support:
Model training pipelines
Packaging & deployment
Serving & rollout
Monitoring & alerting
Collaborate closely with Data Scientists, Business, and Product teams to deeply understand requirements and design adaptable, scalable solutions
Integrate platform components into MoMo‚Äôs broader infrastructure: promotion engine, A/B testing, analytics, real-time scoring, etc.

Our mission at what3words is to become the global standard for addressing. Street addresses weren‚Äôt designed for 2025. They aren‚Äôt accurate enough to specify building entrances, and they don‚Äôt exist for parks, rural areas and many parts of the world. This makes it hard to find places and causes problems and inefficiencies on a global scale.
 That‚Äôs why we created what3words. We divided the world into 3m squares and gave each square a unique combination of three words. It‚Äôs the easiest way to find and share precise locations.
 In late 2024, we welcomed Swiftcomplete into the what3words family. Their expertise in fast, intelligent, and scalable address validation technology strengthens our ability to make location data even more accessible, accurate, and easy to use. Together, we‚Äôre building the most powerful addressing standard and address validation products in the world.
 Over the last year, what3words has been used in 193 countries, and our monthly active users continue to grow at an impressive pace. Our tech is used by emergency services, delivery companies, eCommerce businesses, ride-hailing apps and NGOs, and is integrated into the navigation systems of millions of cars around the world.

Who we‚Äôre looking for

We are looking for a Full Stack Staff Engineer to join our growing team of 25+ engineers in Ho Chi Minh City to own end‚Äëto‚Äëend delivery of an address autocomplete & validation app for Shopify, focusing on Checkout UI Extensions and app Admin configuration. This is an independent role (architecture ‚Üí code ‚Üí release). Work closely with Swiftcomplete Product Managers‚Äîwho define scope & functionality‚Äîand co‚Äëdesign based on your expertise.

Collaboration with Product Management

You‚Äôll work closely with Swiftcomplete Product Managers who own scope and business outcomes. They will collaborate with you in the design process and expect you to contribute options and trade‚Äëoffs based on your engineering experience.

contexts:
Job Type: Full-time, Permanent
Level: Senior 
Location: Onsite - Pho Quang Street, Tan Son Hoa Ward, HCMC
 General Information:
We are seeking a Senior .NET Developer to join our engineering team working on international client projects. You will contribute to the development of web-based AI applications using .NET and collaborate closely with our project team and directly with the clients as well. If you know how to balance clean architecture with practical delivery, you‚Äôll fit right in!
 Responsibilities:
Design and develop web applications for AI solutions for SMEs, using .Net.
Build responsive, interactive front-end features using modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks.
Design and optimize applications for performance and scalability.
Apply pragmatic software architecture and clean coding principles, balancing maintainability with fast delivery.
Participate in system design discussions, suggesting improvements and alternative solutions when appropriate.
Communicate effectively with the team and stakeholders to clarify requirements.
Ensure on-time delivery of features that meet both technical and business requirements.
Participate in internal reviews, testing, deployment, and documentation processes.

About the Client - Elfo is a prominent provider of cutting-edge and specialized ERP systems in Norway. Their core development team in Ho Chi Minh City is responsible for keeping the solution at the cutting edge. Joining this exciting opportunity, you will be able to progress further, by working together with other high level and experienced colleagues like yourself. You have the freedom to take on responsibility as and when you want to, have close contact with the management and have a voice to give your ideas and input as we work in a Norwegian style flat hierarchy.
About the Role:
Work directly with the CEO in Norway, working across time zones and continents, you will be involved in:
Develop ERP applications with Azure, .NET core, C#, ASP.NET MVC, JQuery, MSSQL, Kendo, Vue.js
In very close collaboration with the CEO and Delivery Manager in Norway to ensure solutions are developed with maintainability and security at the heart
Spot opportunities for process and tool improvements, keeping an eye on latest updates on development best practice
You will also work with, resolving escalations and diagnosing issues or bugs
As a core team member at Elfo, you will be responsible for producing a high quality end product

Our Tech stack:
Our core services consist hundreds of Golang microservices built around domain oriented, event driven architecture. All run on GCP, GKE, Istio with autoscaling, resiliency and chaos engineering mindset with full end to end observability.
Our mobile platform was running on Android/iOS/Flutter, component based, composable architecture. Web app largely on TypeScript, React, NextJS, Tailwind CSS and composable in-house design components and framework. 
Gitlab for all code repository, CI/CD, with Backstage as centralized developer productivity platform.
DevOps culture, you are fully responsible with design, build, and operate your own services with support from SRE, Platform team as needed
Open source lover, and open source contributor. All tooling and platforms used was in-house custom built on popular open source projects
Embraced engineering culture, and agile development.
Spirit
Accept failures, learn from it and move extremely fast. 
Flexible working environment, and performance-based optimization focus
Ownership and excellent learning opportunity, in-house and external
Be part of the team, who set the trend, influence and build meaningful product to millions of fello Vietnamese
Responsibilities:
You will work closely with the Product, UX/UI and Backend teams to design, build new products, platforms and features.
More senior engineers will act as a role model and mentor to more junior members.
Build re-usable Android software components for the Be platform.
Collaborate with QA on continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) as well as other automated and manual testing to make sure our app release cycles
You will monitor the performance of the live apps and continuously improve them on both code and experience level.
Design, build and improve the mobile experiences for one of the world's fastest growing mobile app in ride-hailing, payments and logistics.
Provide technology leadership to the team and foster engineering excellence.
Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross functional teams in a global environment.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
Help maintain code quality, organization and automatization

details.ground_truth:
Our mission at what3words is to become the global standard for addressing. Street addresses weren‚Äôt designed for 2025. They aren‚Äôt accurate enough to specify building entrances, and they don‚Äôt exist for parks, rural areas and many parts of the world. This makes it hard to find places and causes problems and inefficiencies on a global scale.
 That‚Äôs why we created what3words. We divided the world into 3m squares and gave each square a unique combination of three words. It‚Äôs the easiest way to find and share precise locations.
 In late 2024, we welcomed Swiftcomplete into the what3words family. Their expertise in fast, intelligent, and scalable address validation technology strengthens our ability to make location data even more accessible, accurate, and easy to use. Together, we‚Äôre building the most powerful addressing standard and address validation products in the world.
 Over the last year, what3words has been used in 193 countries, and our monthly active users continue to grow at an impressive pace. Our tech is used by emergency services, delivery companies, eCommerce businesses, ride-hailing apps and NGOs, and is integrated into the navigation systems of millions of cars around the world.

Who we‚Äôre looking for

We are looking for a Full Stack Staff Engineer to join our growing team of 25+ engineers in Ho Chi Minh City to own end‚Äëto‚Äëend delivery of an address autocomplete & validation app for Shopify, focusing on Checkout UI Extensions and app Admin configuration. This is an independent role (architecture ‚Üí code ‚Üí release). Work closely with Swiftcomplete Product Managers‚Äîwho define scope & functionality‚Äîand co‚Äëdesign based on your expertise.

Collaboration with Product Management

You‚Äôll work closely with Swiftcomplete Product Managers who own scope and business outcomes. They will collaborate with you in the design process and expect you to contribute options and trade‚Äëoffs based on your engineering experience.

What do we do? 
As a pioneer for digital transformation, GFT develops sustainable solutions across new technologies ‚Äì from cloud engineering and artificial intelligence to blockchain/DLT. With its deep technological expertise, strong partnerships, and comprehensive market know-how, GFT offers advice to the financial and insurance sectors, as well as the manufacturing industry. Through the intelligent use of IT solutions, GFT increases productivity and creates added value for clients. Companies gain easy and safe access to scalable IT applications and innovative business models. 
  Who are we? 
Having started in Germany in 1987, GFT Technologies has grown to become a trusted Software Engineering and Consulting specialist for the international financial industry, counting many of the world‚Äôs largest and best-known banks as our clients. We are an organization that empowers you to not only explore but also raise your potential and seek out opportunities that add value. At GFT, diversity, equality, and inclusion are at the core of who we are. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive working environment for all communities is one of the main pillars of our diversity strategy, based on our core values and culture. We have been certified for 2022/23 as a ‚ÄòGreat Place to Work‚Äô in the APAC region. So, if you want to have the opportunity to work with an outstanding and progressive organization, this position could be right for you. 
 Role Summary 
We are looking for experienced and talented (Senior) Backend Engineers to join our global engineering teams and developing and operating our flagship product (Digital Bank platform). 
 Sign-on Bonus: Eligible for candidates who are currently employed elsewhere and able to join GFT before 4th January 2026.
 Key Responsibilities 
Design, develop, implement and maintain Java application
Write high quality, maintainable code using TDD and DDD

Design and implement RESTful APIs

Work with the distributed team in multiple time zones
Actively participate in Scrum technologies
details.ground_truth:
We are seeking an experienced Database Site Reliability Engineer (DBSRE) to support and operate enterprise-scale, mission-critical database platforms across PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL/MariaDB, and Microsoft SQL Server. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in high availability, performance tuning, disaster recovery.
 ‚Ä¢ Install, configure, and manage PostgreSQL (Patroni), MongoDB replica sets, MySQL/MariaDB HA, and MS SQL Server Always On in production environments.
‚Ä¢ Ensure high availability, replication, and automated failover for mission-critical databases.
‚Ä¢ Perform database and query performance tuning, indexing optimization, and resource utilization analysis.
‚Ä¢ Maintain backup and recovery strategies using pgBackRest, PBM, Percona XtraBackup, and SQL Server native tools.
‚Ä¢ Conduct Disaster Recovery (DR) drills, ensuring RTO/RPO compliance.
‚Ä¢ Automate database provisioning, configuration, and operations.
‚Ä¢ Implement and maintain monitoring and alerting using Prometheus, Grafana, and PMM.
‚Ä¢ Perform database upgrades, migrations, and patching with minimal downtime.
‚Ä¢ Implement strong security, access controls, encryption, and auditing practices.
‚Ä¢ Maintain SOPs, technical documentation, architecture diagrams, and operational runbooks.
‚Ä¢ Participate in 24x7 on-call rotations, resolve incidents, and ensure SLA adherence.

 As a Python Technical Lead, you will be responsible for leading and mentoring a team of Python developers, designing scalable and robust software architectures. This role offers a unique opportunity to work on impactful projects, collaborate with international teams, and grow with us focused on innovation, excellence, and value creation.
 Key Responsibilities
Lead the architecture, design, and development of enterprise-grade Python applications and backend services.
Serve as the primary technical authority and provide strategic direction on Python technology stack, design patterns, and software methodologies.
Architect and implement scalable and secure systems using microservices, cloud-native designs, and distributed computing techniques.

We are a global product team focused on building payment and e-commerce solutions that make an impact. We have dedicated our efforts to assisting merchants in running online businesses and reaching customers in every country in the world.
Who Are We Looking For
We‚Äôre looking for a proactive and results-driven Product Manager who thrives in fast-paced environments and is passionate about building impactful solutions. You should be strategic, customer-focused, and execution-oriented ‚Äî capable of translating business needs into product strategy, aligning cross-functional teams, and driving the end-to-end product lifecycle from discovery to launch. If you excel at identifying opportunities, shipping valuable features, and continuously improving products based on data and feedback, this role is for you.
HONESTY and TRUST are core to who we are. We expect transparent and truthful communication from all our team members.
LEARNING and CURIOSITY are essential for growth here. You bring fresh ideas, creativity, and a desire to develop daily, absorbing knowledge from those around you.
Multilingual and Multilingual? Even better. You embrace international collaboration and thrive in global environments. Bonus points if you have cross-border experience or fluency in multiple languages.
Position Overview
As the Product Manager, you will drive the development and enhancement of our AI-powered global identity platform. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver a product that not only meets rigorous compliance standards but also provides an exceptional user experience across our diverse client base spanning 190+ countries.
What You Will Do
Lead the strategic planning and execution platform development, ensuring alignment with our vision of becoming the gold standard in identity verification
Orchestrate the implementation of advanced AI/ML technologies that power our automated verification processes, including state-of-the-art OCR, Face ID, Voice ID, Anti-deepfake, etc
Manage the development of our multimodal verification capabilities spanning ID document processing, face liveness verification, and AML screening across 200+ languages
Coordinate with engineering teams to enhance our microservice architecture, ensuring scalability and flexibility as our user base grows
Drive the continuous improvement of our REST APIs and SDKs for major platforms, facilitating seamless integration for our clients
Collaborate with data scientists and AI specialists to refine our dynamic risk assessment models and ensure they remain at the cutting edge of fraud detection
Balance the implementation of automated verification with human expert oversight to maintain the highest levels of accuracy and integrity
Ensure all platform developments adhere to global compliance standards and prioritize data privacy and security

Highly motivated and detail-oriented QA Tester with 5+ years of experience in software testing. Proficient in creating and executing test cases, setting up test environments, and reporting bugs. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with experience working with cross-functional teams.

Technical Skills:
- Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies (Agile, Scrum, Waterfall)

- Experienced in bug tracking and management tools (JIRA, Bugzilla)
- Familiarity with test automation frameworks (Selenium, Appium)
- Strong understanding of database concepts and SQL
- Experience with cloud-based testing platforms (AWS, Azure)
- Proficient in operating systems (Windows, Linux, macOS)

Professional Experience:
QA Tester, ABC Company (2018-Present)

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams (QA, Development, Support, Sales, Product) to ensure optimal product quality
- Provide task estimations and report on progress to ensure timely project delivery
- Conduct bug verification and prioritize/severity quality bugs to ensure high-quality product releases

QA Tester, DEF Company (2015-2018)
- Created and updated test cases for new and existing features
- Executed test cases and reported bugs with detailed information
- Set up and managed test environments according to feature specifications
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure optimal product quality
- Provided task estimations and reported on progress to ensure timely project delivery

Education:
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Anytown University (2015)

Certifications:
- Certified Software Tester (CSTE)
- Certified Test Manager (CTM)

Soft Skills:
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing requirements
- Strong attention to detail and ability to prioritize tasks effectively
- Experience working in Agile and Scrum environments
- Strong team player with ability to work independently and as part of a team

Available upon request.
